allOf.description: Identifies two or more records (resource instances) that are referring to the same real-world "occurrence".

active.description: Indicates whether the asserted set of linkages are considered to be "in effect".

author.description: Identifies the user or organization responsible for asserting the linkages and who establishes the context for evaluating the nature of each linkage.

item.description: Identifies one of the records that is considered to refer to the same real-world occurrence as well as how the items hould be evaluated within the collection of linked items.
